instructions.text: Mmmm... Nice! Looks like the package should be arriving today. I can finally put my PC together!
I've been holding onto all the other parts for [shake level=10]months[/shake] now... You have [shake]NO[/shake] idea how much trouble I went through to get this.
I spent months scouring articles, forums, and streams just to land the opportunity to purchase it.
[fade start=12 length=105]Stupid scalpers making me waste so much time. Can't believe I spent so much of my life looking at an alarm...[/fade]
Just thinking of having to pay a marked up price of a couple grand is revolting!! How do they have the conscience to do such a thing?
[color=fuchsia]*Sigh*[/color] - Scrolling through and looking at these prices again is enough to infuriate me.
Seems like I have a good amount of time until the package arrives - the day has just started after all.
I should take care of some of the chores I've been putting off.
Annnyyyy second now... Mailman should be coming by around this time.
Maybe they're shipping it through a different carrier?
It's getting late now... [color=fuchsia]*Sigh*[/color] - Guess I shouldn't trust delivery times...
[fade start=12 length=93]Don't count on anything being on time I guess... [shake level=10]Especially[/shake] when you are looking forward to it.[/fade]
Can't believe I spent [shake]all day[/shake] waiting for a package that didn't arrive.
Ugh - Why haven't I put up blinds in my own room yet?
